attributes.action: Increase Tax on Airtravel To Subsidise Train Fares
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the huge amount of fuel used in air travel damages our planet so much that, it would be better if more taxes were put on Air travel and the extra money used to reduce Train Fares which are kinder to the environment and very expensive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
